articles.title: Poco F2 Pro debuts as basically a Redmi K30 Pro running the Poco launcher - Android Police
articles.description: Poco’s first phone created quite a stir back in 2018 when it came out rocking the then-flagship Snapdragon 845 chip for an astonishingly low price
articles.content: Pocos first phone created quite a stir back in 2018 when it came out rocking the then-flagship Snapdragon 845 chip for an astonishingly low price tag of about $300. It took the Xiaomi spin-off close to two years to deliver its hotly anticipated follow-up, whi… [+2885 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Carman
articles.title: Instagram now lets people delete comments in bulk and is testing pinned comments - The Verge
articles.description: Instagram is launching more moderation tools to keep the platform positive. Users can now delete comments in bulk and restrict or block multiple accounts at once. They can also choose who can tag them in captions, stories, or comments.
articles.content:
To make the platform more positive
Image: Instagram
Instagram is launching and testing multiple new features starting today that are aimed at making the platform a more positive space. The company says its rolling out the ability to delete up to 25 comments… [+2090 chars]
